summary: I prefer to play a Breton avatar because Bretons are gifted with more magica, and more resistance to magic, than the other races.
descriptionHtml:
I have found it difficult to create a nice-looking Breton with Bethesda\'s character-creation tools, but this one came out pretty well.

I chose to provide a level-one game save just after the character has exited the cavern after Helgen Keep.

You probably are familiar with using the console command \"showracemenu\" to change an avatar\'s name--in this case, \"Eowyn\"--or hairstyle or anything else you don\'t like, but \"showracemenu\" resets your avatar\'s perks, so (as you are probably aware) it isn\'t a good idea to use \"showracemenu\" with upper-level characters. 

But using \"showracemenu\" with a level-one character that has no perks to begin with makes no difference.

This character looks perfectly okay with vanilla Skyrim, but even better with Xenius\'s \"No More Blocky Faces\" mod.
author: Herbivore
